articles.author: Claire Jones, Joe Leahy
articles.title: Janet Yellen says US will protect green tech from China competition - Financial Times
articles.description: Trade barriers not ruled out by Treasury secretary ahead of talks with Beijing officials
articles.content:
Washington will not allow a glut of Chinese production to wipe out American manufacturers of green technology, US Treasury secretary Janet Yellen has warned ahead of a trip to China.
